Original Text: She auditions to be a dancer at Cheung Lai Yuen for a better income and a chance to find her father, who is the Emperor. Evergreen Mak as Ko Yan (**) / Kiu Bo-lung (***), a Music Bureau official who looks over Cheung Lai Yuen. In a quarrel with Ming-but, Bo-lung loses his memory and gets half of his face burnt.
